metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41991 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The in-memory certificate cache in strongSwan before 5.9.4 has a remote integer overflow upon receiving many requests with different certificates to fill the cache and later trigger the replacement of cache entries. The code attempts to select a less-often-used cache entry by means of a random number generator, but this is not done correctly. Remote code execution might be a slight possibility.

criterions.comment: strongswan package in fips/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
